# How do I get to Macungie, PA?
Ourbus has routes that cover locations for most of our guests. The closest bus stop to Macungie is <a href="https://www.ourbus.com/stopdetails/allentownbusterminal">Allentown - Wescosville, PA</a>.

Guests looking to carpool can check out this <a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kDDLfQV8I0KrQSEwbtzBt_eTv0xEuN6THV1I2STto2k/edit?usp=sharing">Google Sheets form</a> to see if another guest is departing from your location. If you are willing and able to pick up guests, please add your info to this <a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kDDLfQV8I0KrQSEwbtzBt_eTv0xEuN6THV1I2STto2k/edit?usp=sharing">Google Sheets form</a>.
<br> <br> <br>
